page.title: 14SEWAGE WORKS AT SUTTON
page.content:
{It is rather a surprise to find in {such a rural area of farmland and {woodland, two large sewage works.}
It is also surprising in an area of such beautiful hedgerows, with rabbits playing almost oblivious to one's presence, to be suddenly deafened by the noise of a pack of fighter aircraft passing overhead.
But therein lies the reason, a community of many thousands of american personnel at R.A.F Woodbridge live and work there, completely self-contained, out-of-view among the trees with their own schools, shops and , of course,
{even their own sewage works!
